g_flags: Have a habit of washing your hands regularly
y_flags: A history of skin problems, including cellulitis
y_means: You are at risk for infection
r_flags: Red, swollen, tender skin that is warm to the touch and a fever of 100.4 or higher.
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

g_flags: Have no open wounds, rashes, or skin breakdown
y_flags: Red, painful, and warm areas on your skin

g_flags: Moisturize your skin to avoid cracking/peeling.

y_flags: No improvement in symptoms or they are worse
